Machine Learning With Python


Description :-


Study and understand the principles of Machine Learning using Data Analysis with the help of Numpy and Pandas through our Capstone Projects (Minor + Major Project) Understand the field of natural language processing (NLP), learn information extraction, machine language translation, automatic text summarization etc.


What you will learn?


  • Learn the Statistical aspects of Machine Learning and implement models like Vector Machines, K-means, Random Forest Classifier, Regression, Evaluation Matrix.
  • Get a thorough approach regarding Supervised and Unsupervised learning along with the Mini Projects based on their studies.
  • Learn how to create systems that can understand and produce language, for applications such as information extraction, machine translation, automatic summarization using NLP.

What you will get?


  • MTA Certificate ( Microsoft Technology Associate) (MTA/Python)*
  • Certificate of Completion on successful submission of projects and assignment.
  • Guaranteed co-branded Internship Certificate from Verzeo and one of our partnered companies.
  • Certificate of Participantion from ELAN & NVISION + Verzeo


Online



Web Development



Description :-


Web development broadly refers to the tasks associated with developing websites for hosting via intranet or internet. The web development process includes web design, web content development, client-side/server-side scripting, among other tasks.


What you will learn?


  • Front-End: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Jquery
  • Server Side: NodeJs and Django
  • Database: MySQL
  • FrameWork and Tools: Bootstrap, CSS Preprocessors
  • Building and deploying web projects - NPM/Grunt/Gulp

What you will get?


  • MTA Certificate ( Microsoft Technology Associate) (MTA/Web Development)*
  • Certificate of Completion on successful submission of projects and assignment.
  • Guaranteed co-branded Internship Certificate from Verzeo and one of our partnered companies.
  • Certificate of Participantion from ELAN & NVISION + Verzeo
